channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GLOBAL][Baremetal] - Debian-10-based rescue system (rescue-customer boot mode) removal
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 23, 09:00 - 13:00 UTC

Apr 17, 14:50 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Baremetal offer.

Start time : 23/06/2025 09:00 UTC
End time : 23/06/2025 13:00 UTC
Service impact : The Debian-10-based rescue system (rescue-customer boot mode) will no longer be available after 23/06/2025.
Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to remove the Debian-10-based rescue system (rescue-customer boot mode) for all Baremetal products.
Customers should start using the new Debian-12-based rescue system (rescue12-customer).

Thank you for your understanding.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX8][Cooling System] - Rack R807R19
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 31, 06:00 - 18:00 UTC

May 14, 12:51 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Start time : 31/05/2025 06:00 UTC
End time : 31/05/2025 18:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers in this rack will be unavailable for a maximum of 12 hours.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some cooling system replacement and upgrade.
The maintenance may be completed in less time than expected, and we are committed to minimizing the outage duration.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [BHS2][Virtual Private Servers] - Workflow Management service maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 20, 14:00 - 15:00 UTC

May 14, 19:44 UTC
Scheduled - We want to inform you about an upcoming maintenance window for our Workflow Management service, Mistral.

Here are the details of the maintenance:
Start time : 20/05/2025 14:00 UTC
End time : 20/05/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance window for the Workflow Management service (Mistral), you may encounter the following impacts:

Workflows in progress at the start of the maintenance will be stopped and will be restarted automatically after the maintenance is completed. We understand that this may cause a temporary disruption in your workflow processing, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Cron triggers (scheduled workflow executions) during the maintenance period will not be triggered. If you have any workflows scheduled to run during the maintenance window, we recommend rescheduling them to run outside of this timeframe to avoid any disruption.

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing a maintenance on the Mistral service infrastructure. This maintenance is necessary to ensure the continued reliability and performance of our platform.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 19, 18:00 UTC  -  May 23, 02:00 UTC

May 6, 20:49 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 19/05/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 23/05/2025 02:00 UTC
Service impact : Concerned servers will be temporarily unavailable during the maintenance for 8 hours maximum.
Customers who have servers concerned by this operation have been informed by our support.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be migrating some servers from RBX1 to RBX3.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack GRA0316B04A incident notification
item.description:

End time : 18/05/2025 05:15 UTC

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

May 18, 03:55 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on the specific rack.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 18/05/2025 03:42 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Public and private networks are temporarily unavailable for servers in the specified rack.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access and use their servers in rack GRA0316B04A through public and private networks.
However, customers who enabled LACP (Link Aggregation Control Protocol) are able to access their servers but are facing bandwidth reduction.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [SBG6][Virtual Private Servers] - Workflow Management service maintenance notification
item.description:
May 15, 13:27 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All services are operational. There has been no impact since 15/05/2025 13:16 UTC.

May 15, 12:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

May 12, 14:16 UTC
Scheduled - We want to inform you about an upcoming maintenance window for our Workflow Management service, Mistral.

Here are the details of the maintenance:
Start time : 15/05/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 15/05/2025 14:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance window for the Workflow Management service (Mistral), you may encounter the following impacts:

Workflows in progress at the start of the maintenance will be stopped and will be restarted automatically after the maintenance is completed. We understand that this may cause a temporary disruption in your workflow processing, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Cron triggers (scheduled workflow executions) during the maintenance period will not be triggered. If you have any workflows scheduled to run during the maintenance window, we recommend rescheduling them to run outside of this timeframe to avoid any disruption.

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing a maintenance on the Mistral service infrastructure. This maintenance is necessary to ensure the continued reliability and performance of our platform.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

Thank you for your understanding.
